file_content.text: It's getting harder and harder to recruit for these missions....
One of your mercs asked me to clean up some mutant rakghouls he couldn't handle.
Well, you certainly don't look like an ordinary group of mercenaries.
Master Jedi, I am honored that you would take on such a task.
Lieutenant! I didn't realize Havoc Squad was here. I would certainly have come to you first.
I trust you've come to collect the reward. If you've destroyed those berserkers, it's well worth it.
I don't know what they're thinking, opening this place to colonization....
A hundred million planets in the galaxy and we want this one?
